casebody.data:
David PFLUGH, Appellant
v.
INDIANAPOLIS HISTORIC PRESERVATION COMMISSION as IHPC & as BZA Marion Co., IN, et al. Supreme Court of Indiana. November 20, 2018

Transfer denied. All Justices concur, except Rush, C.J., who votes to grant the petition to transfer. Slaughter, J., did not participate in the decision of this matter.
